verses.verse: (Ex. 6:6; Deut. 4:34; 5:15; 7:19; 9:29; 11:2; 2 Kin. 17:36; 2 Chr. 6:32; Jer. 32:17) To Him who divided the Red Sea in two, For His mercy endures forever;
And made Israel pass through the midst of it, For His mercy endures forever;
(Ex. 14:21) But overthrew Pharaoh and his army in the Red Sea, For His mercy endures forever;
(Ex. 14:27) To Him who led His people through the wilderness, For His mercy endures forever;
(Ex. 13:18; 15:22; Deut. 8:15) To Him who struck down great kings, For His mercy endures forever;
(Ps. 135:10-12) And slew famous kings, For His mercy endures forever—
(Deut. 29:7) Sihon king of the Amorites, For His mercy endures forever;
(Num. 21:21) And Og king of Bashan, For His mercy endures forever—
(Num. 21:33) And gave their land as a heritage, For His mercy endures forever;
